implementation.parameter: You must have an assassins ID before you can enter.
You must have an assassins ID before you can enter.

entity.attribute:
WORLDS FUNNIEST JOKES
If a man stands in the middle of the forest speaking and there is no woman around to hear him, is he still wrong?
Everyone has a photographic memory, some just don't have film.
Eagles may soar, free and proud, but weasels never get sucked into jet engines.
There's no future in time travel.
... continued on next page

Artificial intelligence is no match for natural stupidity.
Honk if you love peace and quiet.
Always remember you're unique, just like everyone else.
Half the people in the world are below average.

implementation.parameter: You can sell these archery items to Merewen.

entity.attribute: You see a beautiful piano. Perhaps you could play it.

point-of-interest.name: Nalwor Drow Tunnels 1
point-of-interest.title: Nalwor Drow Tunnels
point-of-interest.description: The Drow Tunnels are populated by evil dark elves which are really dangerous. But there are also some mystical creatures which are waiting for their next victims... (Player Level 60 - 597)

You stumble and trip over bodies wrapped in silken spider thread. Many of the bodies are of great warriors, who seem to have met their match.
You fall down a deep chasm into the fires of hell. You can hear screaming of some poor soul being tortured, and the roars of fearsome creatures.
You have been caught by a hellish official, and are now in the Pit where you need to answer the reapers' questions.
